description: Monitoring dashboard for Blizzard NDJSON.gz ingestion pipeline

panels.description: Rate of files processed per second
panels.title: Files Processed Rate

panels.description: Rate of records processed per second
panels.title: Records Processed Rate

panels.description: Rate of bytes read from source files
panels.title: Bytes Read Rate

panels.description: Rate of bytes written to Parquet files
panels.title: Bytes Written Rate

panels.description: Time since the last successful checkpoint. High values indicate checkpoint issues.
panels.title: Checkpoint Age

panels.description: Percentage of files that failed processing
panels.title: Error Rate

panels.description: Current number of files pending processing
panels.title: Pending Files

panels.description: Total number of files discovered
panels.title: Files Discovered

panels.description: Files discovered vs processed over time, showing processing backlog
panels.title: File Discovery vs Processing

panels.description: Processing rates for records and batches
panels.title: Records & Batches Rate

panels.description: Throughput comparing bytes read from source vs bytes written to Parquet
panels.title: Bytes Throughput

panels.description: Rate of files processed, broken down by status (success, error, skipped)
panels.title: Files Processed by Status

panels.description: Distribution of file download durations
panels.title: Download Duration

panels.description: Distribution of file decompression durations
panels.title: Decompression Duration

panels.description: Distribution of Parquet file write durations
panels.title: Parquet Write Duration

panels.description: Distribution of storage request latencies by operation
panels.title: Storage Request Latency

panels.description: Number of concurrent download and upload operations
panels.title: Active Operations

panels.description: Queue depths showing backpressure in the pipeline
panels.title: Queue Depths

panels.description: Pipeline stage utilization percentage (0-100%)
panels.title: Stage Utilization

panels.description: Rate of polling iterations by result type (processed = found work, no_items = idle)
panels.title: Iterations by Result

panels.description: Distribution of polling iteration durations
panels.title: Iteration Duration

panels.description: Total multipart uploads completed
panels.title: Upload Operations

panels.description: Rate of storage requests by operation type
panels.title: Storage Requests by Operation

panels.description: Rate of file failures by pipeline stage
panels.title: Files Failed by Stage

panels.description: Rate of storage errors by operation type
panels.title: Storage Errors

panels.description: Number of schema fields with type conflicts that were coerced to Utf8 strings during inference
panels.title: Schema Type Conflicts

panels.description: Number of files tracked in the SourceState HashMap
panels.title: Source State Files

panels.description: Bytes of Parquet files waiting to be uploaded
panels.title: Upload Queue Bytes

panels.description: Total parquet bytes written
panels.title: Parquet Write Rate

panels.description: Source state files tracked over time
panels.title: Source State Growth

panels.description: Memory held in upload buffers
panels.title: Upload Buffer Memory

title: [SYS] Blizzard
